description: This file defines Express routes for retrieving user and global game statistics in a multiplayer ludo game backend. It includes two GET endpoints: '/api/stats/me' for authenticated user stats and recent games, and '/api/stats/global' for aggregated global statistics.

methods.name: GET /me
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user's stats and recent game history, limited to 10 entries, sorted by creation date descending.

methods.name: GET /global
methods.description: Retrieves total user count and top 5 users sorted by number of games won.
